mapper.select: select dc_strategy.id as id, dc_strategy.name, dc_strategy.path from dc_task, dc_strategy where dc_task.strategy_id = dc_strategy.id and dc_task.id=#{id};

select dc_devcie.id, dc_devcie.name, dc_devcie.alias, dc_devcie.ip_address, dc_devcie.status from dc_devcie,dc_group_device_ref,dc_task where dc_task.id=#{id} and dc_task.group_id=dc_group_device_ref.group_id and dc_group_device_ref.device_id=dc_devcie.id
